title: Visit the Emperor's Old Hideout
content: itor (Ch'r'ai Har'rak) and several warriors are waiting to ambush you in the hideout. Close the portals ASAP or there will be more enemies joining the fight. Once all the gith are defeated, loot the bodies and press the button behind the large statue to reveal another hidden room. There are lots of valuable equipment in that hidden room, along with some trinkets of the Emperor's old life. You can learn more history about this guardian of yours.
